import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Card, Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; // images import logo from '../../assets/images/logo.png'; const MailOpened = () => { return ( ); }; const Confirm = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('Please check your inbox')}

{t('We sent a confirmation link to you at')}{' '} youremail@domain.com

{t('Simply click on the link available in the email to confirm your account.')}

{t('Back to')} {t('Log In')}

); }; export default Confirm;
